meanings.definition: Doest: second person singular present of do
meanings.sent2: What doest thou like to do in your free time?
meanings.sent3: When thou doest read, the characters come alive in thy mind.
meanings.sent4: The way thou doest immerse yourself in stories is truly magical.
meanings.sent5: Imagining the adventures as thou doest read makes the experience unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: Why doest he always arrive late to the meetings?
meanings.sent2: She doest her best to help others whenever she can.
meanings.sent3: Even though he doest procrastinate, he still manages to finish his work on time.
meanings.sent4: The way she doest tackle challenges head-on is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: His determination to succeed shines through in everything he doest.
